website_summaries.verdict: A good mitt that provides exactly what most recreational-level adult players need.
pros: The 33.5-inch size fits the majority of adult players
Quality leather doesn’t need much of a break-in period
Lace pattern gives the flexibility you need to secure pitches in the webbing
Padded liner in palm deadens the ball at impact
cons: Product quality isn’t high enough to match what regular adult players would need for a full season

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!  I was for sure expecting a nice mit , but WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for an awesome catchers mit .. Look no further. A great price for top quality. I have a $450.00 infielders glove and there's not much of a difference with this catchers mit. I would hurry up and purchase it , before the price changes.. It's definitely recommend....
customer_reviews.author: BigErn19

customer_reviews.title: Great beginners mitt/backup mitt
customer_reviews.text: Perfect catchers mitt for a new catcher or an adult looking to use it as a backup. Would be great for someone who only catches occasionally. Leather is great, binding is so-so, laces are junk. With nice lacing, this glove would be very nice.
customer_reviews.author: madi

customer_reviews.title: Good glove for the money
customer_reviews.text: Didn't take long to break in, formed a box. He's been using it since late April, likes it, I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst ever.
customer_reviews.text: A gift. A right handed glove. It was not the glove on the picture. A left handed glove is shown. It was delivered two houses down.
customer_reviews.author: Bels

customer_reviews.title: Great glove for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our 11 year old catcher. He's used it for 2 months and it is in great shape. It came fairly broken in. We just put some glove oil on it overnight and played catch with it for a week and it is just the way he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Break in...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this because of mizunos are usually just about ready to use right out of the pack. Also, my daughter used this exact glove prior ordering (from another parent). Parent stated that their glove was ready to use once they received it. I’ve been purchasing/using mizuno gloves and normally they’re ready to go but this one was Not even close to being broken in.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mayo

customer_reviews.title: Great glove.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter is a pitcher and has already ruined my old glove. Great so far and hand doesn't hurt anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great product - great price
customer_reviews.text: Love Mizuno products, this lived up to the brand name. Great product. Great price, got it in 1 day! A++
customer_reviews.author: John Weber

customer_reviews.title: Quality glove at a great price
customer_reviews.text: As my son started throwing 70+ mph, I needed this mitt to save my hand -- and it's great. Well-designed, well-constructed and with plenty of padding. And at <$30, it was truly a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For my personal use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself. My son was starting to hurt my hand. It works great for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Brady Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice glove
customer_reviews.text: Its a little smaller than I thought but I will keep shopping. This is a nice glove though.
customer_reviews.author: Tobias Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: The mit was easy to break in. Good price. Hard to find for a lefty on the market. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Foster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value! The mitt was easy to break in than other mitts! Nice leather.
customer_reviews.author: crysong11

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this mitt
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my son. Great mitt for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jay W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The glove only takes about a day or two just to break in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: this is a very nice glove. I use it to catch for my daughter
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Great Mitt
customer_reviews.text: Easy to break in and great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: The picture shows a glove that would be worn on ...
customer_reviews.text: The picture shows a glove that would be worn on the left hand, but what I received was one the is worn on the right hand. This obviously didn’t work so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Glove
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for our middle school team. Looked like a great for the money. It was probably half broke in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Mizuno Franchise Series Baseball Catcher's Mitt 33.5"
product_meta.description: Mizuno Franchise Gloves are constructed using comfortable, hand based patterns, allowing you to shape your glove like a pro. Pre-oiled java leather maintains durability, and provides a soft, game ready feel. 33.50" Franchise Java Leather: Pre-oiled tumbled leather that is game ready and long lasting. HiLo Lacing: Alternating lace pattern retains the integrity of a fully-laced web with greater flexibility. Parashock Plus Palm Pad: Ortholite palm pad reduces sting and deadens the ball at impact. MZO Lining: Disperses perspiration away from the skin.
feature_bullets: Pre-oiled tumbled leather that is game ready and long lasting. Hilo lacing: alternating lace pattern retains the integrity of a fully-laced web with greater flexibility
Sold as "Mizuno Franchise Baseball Catcher's Mitt, Coffee/Silver, 33.5-Inch, Left Hand Throw"
